name: BengaliShaadi.com - Now with Video Calling
description: The Worlds No.1 Bengali Matchmaking Service With over 6 lakh success stories, BengaliShaadi.com is connecting more people for marriage than any matrimonial site! A pioneer in the matchmaking & matrimony industry, weve emerged as the most trusted and secure service for finding a life-partner.   The App is free to download and provides access to features that allow you to:   - Video call your matches with our newly launched Shaadi Meet  - Register & Create your profile - Search by community, city or profession & find new matches everyday - View full profiles of your matches along with their photos  - Shortlist matches you like and save favourites for future viewing  - Chat on-the-go with our Award Winning Bengali Shaadi Messenger - anytime, anywhere!   And if you want to enjoy the following benefits : - View the Phone numbers, Email IDs of the matches youd like to connect with - Send personalized messages and Initiate Chat - Increase your profiles visibility and Responses Just upgrade to a premium membership offered at affordable prices.  Find someone from your city, be it Kolkata, Howrah, Midnapore, Bangalore or Delhi. Search for matches by community like Kayastha, Brahmin Kulin, Sunni and others.  Some accolades that we are proud of include:   - Best Matrimonial Site (Readers Choice, New York Times publication, USA)  - Top 50 Innovative Companies (Fast Company, USA)  - Most Trusted Matrimonial Brand (Brand Equity, Economic Times, India)   BengaliShaadi.com is also one of the smallest sized apps in its category.  So download our app today and find your perfect life partner!   For a daily dose of love and relationship titbits: - Follow us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/ShaadiDotCom - Like us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/shaadicom - Follow us on Instagram at https://www.instagram.com/shaadi.com
